description: This file is a React component for the main page of an image gallery application, managing state for images, tags, and UI dialogs, as well as handling data fetching and user interactions.

methods.name: loadData
methods.description: Fetches images and tags from the API and updates the component state.

methods.name: handleImageClick
methods.description: Sets the clicked image as active to display it in the modal.

methods.name: handleEdit
methods.description: Opens the edit form for the selected image.

methods.name: handleDelete
methods.description: Prepares to delete the selected image, showing confirmation dialog.

methods.name: handleEditSuccess
methods.description: Handles successful editing by closing the edit form and reloading data.

methods.name: handleDeleteSuccess
methods.description: Deletes the image via API and refreshes data after confirmation.
